text: Fabian Raymond Picardo (born 18 February 1972) is a Gibraltarian politician and barrister. He has been Chief Minister of Gibraltar and Leader of the Gibraltar Socialist Labour Party since 2011. The PicardoÂ´s administration highlights for being in favor of Gibraltar remaining in the United Kingdom, and a certain hostility towards Spain. This has led to his being known as "Pirata Picardo" (Pirate Picardo). ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Chief Ministers of Gibraltar Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Barristers Category:Current national leaders
title: Fabian Picardo
